questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
The IaC configuration for an application is being deployed using a CI/CD pipeline. Drag and drop the steps for this pipeline from the left into the correct order that they would be executed on the right. Not all options are used.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
Hmm, "The pipeline notifies the repository to run tests" is weird, a repo can't be notified.

I would go with : 

- The code repository is updated by a user.
- The CI tool is notified of an update.
- Integration test of the most recent configurations is performed
- The configuration changes are pushed to devices.

1. The code repository is updated by a user.
2. The CI tool is notified of an update.
3. Integration test of the most recent configurations is performed.
4. The configuration changes are pushed to devices.

comments.content: don't waste your time with these questions, everything was renewed, I didn't find any single question in the real exam.

discussion.content: 300-910 exam has been fully updated and only about 10% questions on here will be on the test. FYI.

comments.content: The site could be owned by Cisco to mislead the candidates :)

discussion.content: I start wondering if all the default answers provided on this website are deliberately misleading or ticked randomly for the sake of completeness.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. What is causing the requests code to fail?

choices.D: The requests coming into stdin fail because device_ip cannot be parsed.
choices.C: The requests library is not installed.
choices.A: Rython3 is not compatible with requests.
choices.B: The requests library is not imported.

questions.question_text:
An application has been designed based on microservices. The application is deployed on Kubernetes using multiple pods that share the same IP address. Each pod is responsible for a service in the application.

Which command validates the success of the application deployment?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Not sure if B is correct. Anybody else any idea?

Selected Answer: B
Agree with the given solution.

questions.question_text:
A developer is creating an application based on microservices. The application will be used as a central repository for all company's documents. One of the microservices in the application will perform image processing. This microservice must autoscale to meet the current load and avoid down time.

Which metric must be used to trigger autoscaling events?

discussion.content: Not sure about correct answer. Anybody knows please?
